r.d: This is the MySQL MDB2 driver.
r.n: - optimized listTables() and listViews() - optimized show related queries - explicitly set is_manip parameter to false for transaction debug calls - silently change name of primary key contraints to PRIMARY - added ability to hint that a constraint is a primary key in dropConstraint() - typo fixes in phpdoc (thx Stoyan) - added support for fixed and variable types for 'text' in declarations, as well as in reverse engineering (Request #1523) - made _doQuery() return a reference - added userinfo's to all raiseError calls that previously had none - use native prepared queries of mysql 4.1 or higher - added 'prepared_statements' supported meta data setting - added missing supported parameter to prepare() signature
